title: Kip Kinkel // 54
description:
In May 1998, a 15-year-old freshman in high school killed his parents before shooting up his school in Springfield, Oregon. For years he showed signs of danger and potential mental health issues- So how did this terrible event occur? And what exactly happened? This is the story of Kip Kinkel and the Thurston High School Shooting.

_____
